alert.note: Alert for Inland Broward County; Inland Palm Beach County; Metro Palm Beach County (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 22 at 5:51PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...A gusty shower will impact portions of north central Broward and south central Palm Beach Counties through 615 PM EDT... At 550 PM EDT, trained weather spotters reported a funnel cloud near Parkland and west of Margate, or near Coral Springs, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Funnel clouds and winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. IMPACT...Funnel clouds occasionally touch down and produce tornadoes or waterspouts. Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Coral Springs, Parkland, Mission Bay, Loxahatchee NWR, Hillsboro Pines and Sandalfoot Cove. FUNNEL CLOUD...POSSIBLE MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: These winds can down small tree limbs and branches, and blow around unsecured small objects. Seek shelter in a safe building until the storm passes. Funnel clouds occasionally touch down and produce tornadoes or waterspouts. Move indoors and stay away from windows.

area.areaDesc: Inland Broward County; Inland Palm Beach County; Metro Palm Beach County
